thread.title: 3 things to look for at Apple event
thread.title_full: 3 things to look for at Apple event - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Associated Press
title: 3 things to look for at Apple event
text:
Photo: Eric Risberg, Associated Press print_article_embed|photo-8598632|article-6491745|7 comments_jump_embed|photo-8598632|article-6491745|1 email_share_embed|photo-8598632|article-6491745|1 facebook_share_embed|photo-8598632|article-6491745|2 twitter_share_embed|photo-8598632|article-6491745|3 pinterest_share_embed|photo-8598632|article-6491745|4 reddit_share_embed|photo-8598632|article-6491745|5 google_share_embed|photo-8598632|article-6491745|6 A crew works outside the Bill Graham Civic Auditorium as preparations continue for the Apple new product announcements Tuesday, Sept. 8, 2015, in San Francisco. Along with new iPhones, the iconic tech company is expected to show off a new Apple TV system and a bigger role in the home for Siri, its voice-activated digital assistant. (AP Photo/Eric Risberg) A crew works outside the Bill Graham Civic Auditorium as...
Hey, Siri, what does Apple have in store for us this week? A crew works outside the Bill Graham Civic Auditorium as preparations continue for the Apple new product announcements Tuesday, Sept. 8, 2015, in San Francisco. Along with new iPhones, the iconic tech company is expected to show off a new Apple TV system and a bigger role in the home for Siri, its voice-activated digital assistant. (AP Photo/Eric Risberg) A crew works outside the Bill Graham Civic Auditorium as...
Hey, Siri, what does Apple have in store for us this week?
